plays.text: Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Dave Scatchard

Penalty to Oleg Kvasha 2 minutes for Tripping Brian Leetch
Penalty to Eric Lindros 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Garth Snow
Penalty to Michael Peca 2 minutes for Hooking Boris Mironov

Penalty to Vladimir Malakhov 2 minutes for Tripping Alexei Yashin
